definition[0]: small or limited in size, area, or amount
example[0]: It’s difficult trying to work in such a restricted space.
definition[1]: limited or controlled, especially by laws or rules
example[2]: There is restricted access to this information  (=only certain people can have it).
example[3]: The sale of alcohol is restricted to people over the age of 18.
definition[2]: limited in your movements or in what you are able to do
example[4]: The accident left her with restricted movement in her right leg.
example[5]: In those days women led very restricted lives.
definition[3]: a restricted area, document, or information can only be seen or used by a particular group of people because it is secret or dangerous
example[6]: No Entry – restricted area for army personnel only.
